name: multipath
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
travelling along, using, or relating to two or more different routes within a computer network or from a radio or television transmitter (= a device that broadcasts signals) to a receiver (= a device that receives signals): These analogue multipath signals are what can cause picture distortions. Ensure that the multi-path driver is running before you use this command.
More examplesFewer examplesThe signals are immune to the multi-path distortion which plagues FM radio. CDMA signals are also resistant to multipath fading.The problem with multipath propagation is that the different signals take different amounts of time to reach the receiver, so they arrive out of phase with each other.
